Subject: RE: RSO UAE - Store Closure - Karl Lagerfeld – Mall of Emirates - 17th May 2025 
 

Dear All,

 

Thank you for attending the call of today.

 

Kindly be informed that we have a store closure of  “Karl Lagerfeld Mall Of Emirates on Saturday 17th May 2025.

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

 

*	Apply for Mall permits (Merchandise, Non-Merchandise transfer (Store team and logistic) / IT Equipment, Traffic counter, and CCTV Dismantling) @Souhail Bouanga <mailto:Souhail.Bouanga@chalhoub.com>  @Karl Lagerfeld MOE <mailto:KarlLagerfeld.MOE@chalhoub.com> 

*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different one on 17th May at the EOD @Souhail Bouanga <mailto:Souhail.Bouanga@chalhoub.com> 
*	To request for stock collection and non-Stock ASN appointment in one reach @Abel Abraham <mailto:Abel.Abraham@chalhoub.com> 
*	Create/ actioned the RTW in system to be reflected in SIOCS before 17th May @Abel Abraham <mailto:Abel.Abraham@chalhoub.com>  
*	Collection of merchandise transfer and loose furniture on 19th May before trading hours @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net>  @Sredha Mathai <mailto:Sredha.Mathai@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please arrange TG team to collect the Cash Deposit on 18th May / Ensure cancel of the Cash Collection Service Agreement @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  
*	Please Arrange contractor to dismantle the NVR and CCTV on 19th May before trading hours @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  
*	IT Equipment dismantling on 19th May before trading hours, Service request raised @Ruel Apostol <mailto:Ruel.Apostol@chalhoub.com>  @Real Emirates - IT <mailto:RealEmirates-IT@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Ruel Apostol <mailto:Ruel.Apostol@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Sredha Mathai <mailto:Sredha.Mathai@chalhoub.com>  Please share the documentation to store email to apply for permits.

Subject: RSO UAE - Store Closure - Karl Lagerfeld – Mall of Emirates - 17th May 2025 
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a Closure of Store “Karl Lagerfeld Boutique at Mall of Emirates” the Closure date is on Sat 17th May 2025.

Surrender date to mall management: 19th May 2025.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach out at 050-4769298.

Best Regards,

Dear All,

 

Thank you for attending the call of today.

 

Kindly be informed that we have a store closure of  “Karl Lagerfeld Mall Of Emirates on Saturday 17th May 2025.

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

 

*	Apply for Mall permits (Merchandise, Non-Merchandise transfer (Store team and logistic) / IT Equipment, Traffic counter, and CCTV Dismantling) @Souhail Bouanga <mailto:Souhail.Bouanga@chalhoub.com>  @Karl Lagerfeld MOE <mailto:KarlLagerfeld.MOE@chalhoub.com>

*	Please arrange TG team to collect the Cash Deposit on 18th May / Ensure cancel of the Cash Collection Service Agreement @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>
